item.title: Deploy openSUSE Leap15 VM in Kubernetes using KubeVirt
item.description: Introduction If you think that Kubernetes is a cluster for managing containers, then you are dead wrong. Kubernetes is a cluster for managing Pods. In most cases, a Pod is considered to be an abstraction of an container object, so Pod talks to Docker and they know each other. What happens though when we introduce a new guy called libvirt and we learn Pod to talk to it? We have KubeVirt.
